sentences: Mõistab teda, mis ta on teinud.
context: The word 'mõistab' is the third-person singular present form of the Estonian verb 'mõistma'. It primarily means 'to understand' or 'to comprehend', but it can also mean 'to judge' in legal contexts. The dictionary entry shows it used in a religious context referring to judgment day, where Christ will judge all living and dead people.
